body.name: Mobella Classic Glass Baby Bottles for 0 3 6 Months with Slow Flow Nipple, Anti Colic Feeding Bottle for Breast Feeding Babies, Non-Tip Stable Base Newborn Bottles, Infant Bottles, 6 oz/180ML, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 18 mins
features: 100% SAFE GLASS BABY BOTTLES FOR 0 MONTHS UP. Food grade silicone nipple+galss bottle. Safe in dishwasher, freezer, sterilizer, and boiled water. BPA FREE, latex, lead and phthalate free.
DUAL ANTI-COLIC VENT FEEDING BOTTLE. Smart, non-leaking design vents for consistent flow, decreases spit-up, burping and gas.

BREAST-LIKE INFANT BOTTLES. Super soft silicone & mom-like nipple mimics natural breastfeeding, encourages a natural latch, babies can feed at their own pace, and make the transition from breastfeeding to bottle feeding easier.

EASY TO USE & RECYCLABLE NEWBORN BOTTLE. Easy to clean, and know how much your baby is drinking with volume scale. Stable base prevents tipping. If the baby is old enough and dosn't use the bottle, you can put flowers in it as a vase or DIY your favorite pattern on it as a memorable decoration.
GREAT BABY GIFTS FOR NEWBORN AND NEW MOM. With nice packaging, is ready to gift. Definitely worthwhile having in baby shower gift bags and baby registry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely glass bottle
reviews.reviewText: There is so many weird chemicals in plastics and these days I'm just trying to minimize that exposure as much as possible, at least during their first year.My 9 month old loves this bottle, she's able to get a good sip out of it without it leaking when she sets it down and it's easy to clean/assemble.Feels really quality for being just a simple glass bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Mobella Classic Glass Baby Bottles are a delightful and practical choice for parents with newborns and infants aged 0 to 6 months. Designed with a slow flow nipple, these bottles are perfect for ensuring a natural and comfortable feeding experience, closely mimicking breastfeeding. This feature is particularly beneficial for babies who are transitioning between breast and bottle feeding.One of the key advantages of the Mobella bottles is their anti-colic design. This thoughtful feature helps to reduce the discomfort caused by colic, making feeding times more peaceful and enjoyable for both baby and parent. The use of glass in the construction of the bottle is a notable plus, offering a chemical-free, easy-to-clean, and durable alternative to plastic.The non-tip stable base is another thoughtful addition, providing extra security and preventing spills during feeding. Each bottle has a capacity of 6 oz (180ML), making them suitable for a variety of feeding needs.In a charming pink color, these bottles also offer a touch of style. Overall, the Mobella Classic Glass Baby Bottles are an excellent choice for parents seeking a safe, comfortable, and stylish feeding solution for their little ones.The only downside with this one is that my baby didn't seem to like the nipple on this bottle very much but he is very picky and only likes one specific brand that we have tried so far, regardless i believe glass to be a much better choice over plastic and think this will be a great choice for others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice sized glass bottle. It is easy to clean since it doesn't have all those small parts that some bottles have. My baby typically takes Dr. brown bottles but she took this easily as well. My favorite part is that it is glass so I don't have to worry about a plastic chemicals potentially leaching into the milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flow is too strong for 0-3 Months
reviews.reviewText: The bottle is great however the flow is way too strong for the first few months. It would be definitely for 6+ months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Glass Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I've never used a glass baby bottle before. With my son we just had the regular plastic bottles but with baby #2 on the way I wanted to give this a try. It feels fancy honestly. There's a lid that covers the nipple, the glass is thin but feels like nice quality. I really like it! Plus with it being glass I don't have to worry as much about the plastic seeping into the milk/formula when heating it, etc. I plan to use this as long as it lasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice versatile glass bottle. The glass males it easy to clean but of course more fragile. I haven’t dropped it yet, but I’m a bit nervous about it breaking. The nipple is soft and flexible, but it can get pushed in and kinked when it get warmed up during use. Good to reduce waste and quick clean up since it can be tossed in the dishwasher (which I love) as long as you’re not to clumsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice bottle
reviews.reviewText: I thought I was getting the blue on to try since I have a grandson but it's ok, I can just use this bottle in the house only. The bottle itself is very nice and very thick so i don't have to worry about it being a flimsy glass (some glass bottles can be iffy) and he is up to 6 ounces now but once in a while he does still like 4 ounce so this is perfect for him still (except for the pink part, LOL) Very nice bottle overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Who doesn’t love a cute little glass bottle!? This is absolutely adorable!! A little keepsake 🥹!! This is a great baby shower gift! Doesn’t leak and easy to clean

reviews.reviewTitle: Leider ist der Sauger sehr schlecht
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe leider das Bild vom Sauger nicht mehr aber ich kann sagen das es wirklich mega schlecht ist. Beim erstes saugen war der Sauger so fest zusammen gesaugt das keine luft rein kam um wieder die ursprüngliche Form zubekommen oder die Milch weiter zusaugen. Total schade für das schöne stabile Glas und Deckel. Ich habe versucht meine anderen zwei Marken Sauger rein zusetzen um dir Flasche trotzdem zu benutzen zu können aber leider diese haben nicht gepasst. Deshalb empfehle ich die Flasche leider nicht weiter.

Il biberon Mombella Glass Baby Bottle è una scelta eccezionale per i genitori che cercano un'opzione sicura e funzionale per i loro neonati. Realizzato in vetro, offre una soluzione priva di BPA e sicura per il bambino. La presenza della tettarella a flusso lento è ideale per i neonati dai 0 ai 6 mesi, facilitando una transizione più naturale dall'allattamento al seno al biberon.L'aspetto anti-colica è un vantaggio significativo, contribuendo a ridurre il rischio di ingestione di aria durante l'alimentazione. La capacità di 6 oz è perfetta per le piccole dosi di latte nei primi mesi di vita.Il design in rosa aggiunge un tocco carino, rendendolo anche un ottimo regalo per i neonati. Nel complesso, il Mombella Glass Baby Bottle rappresenta una scelta sicura e funzionale per i genitori attenti alla qualità e al benessere del loro bambino.
Biberon de bonne qualité, il est en verre et s'utilise dès la naissance et jusqu'à 6 mois , la tétine est à débit lent, anti coliques, le tout se stérilise facilement.C'est parfait, je recommande

Il biberon arriva ben protetto da un involucro tipo polistirolo sagomato che si occupa egregiamente di attutire i colpi durante il trasporto e all’interno, nella sua scatola ben curata esteticamente, troviamo un piccolo manuale con dei suggerimenti sull’utilizzo e la pulizia ed appunto, il nostro biberon.La bottiglia è in vetro di buona qualità e resistenza alle temperature, quindi è possibile affidarsi al microonde per il riscaldamento del latte e alla lavastoviglie per il lavaggio.Ha una capacità di 180ml, che lo rende ideale per il trasporto in borsa.Infine, la tettarella in silicone garantisce il corretto flusso essendo antirigurgito ed anticoliche.Ritengo che il biberon sia un prodotto coerente con la qualità riportata in descrizione ed equilibrato nel prezzo.

Biberon en verre qui arrive très très bien emballé pour qu’il n’y ait aucune casse.La tétine est bien entendu anti colique. C’est un biberon de 180 ml. Parfait pour un nouveau-né.Il peut être chauffé au micro-ondes comme au chauffe-biberon.Seul point négatif, en cherchant, je n’ai pas trouvé où l’on pouvait acheter des tétines de rechange, ce qui dommage
